H0.text: Whose birthday is celebrated by a public holiday on the third Monday in January in the USA. George Washington

H1.text: Whose birthday is celebrated by a public holiday on the third Monday in January in the USA. Abraham Lincoln

H2.text: Whose birthday is celebrated by a public holiday on the third Monday in January in the USA. Robert E. Lee

H3.text: Whose birthday is celebrated by a public holiday on the third Monday in January in the USA. Mlk

A4.text: Martin Luther King Jr. Day (officially Birthday of Martin Luther King Jr., and often referred to shorthand as MLK Day) is a federal holiday in the United States observed on the third Monday of January each year.

A5.text: The earliest Monday for this holiday is January 15 and the latest is January 21.
